title: Video: TOOTHLESS – Terra
content:
I’ll be honest, I never really been much of a Bombay Bicycle Club fan – I always threw them in with the likes of Foals as being criminally underwhelming late night Radio 1 fodder.

Anyway, this debut offering from TOOTHLESS aka Bombay’s Ed Nash is a rather welcome change of direction – with hints of Beach House and Wild Nothing blossoming throughout the track. Check out the video below.

Like this? Follow our On Repeat Playlist for a handpicked selection of the very best in new music; updated weekly.
author: 5e9b68b27a1236eccfeb1d27
